name: IODispatchQueue
desc: An object that manages the serial execution of blocks.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Creates a new dispatch queue object.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the dispatch queue object.

items.name: - DispatchAsync
items.desc: Schedule a block for asynchronous execution on the current queue.

items.name: - DispatchAsync_f
items.desc: Schedule a C-style function for asynchrous execution on the current queue.

items.name: - DispatchSync
items.desc: Schedule a block for synchronous execution on the current queue.

items.name: - DispatchSync_f
items.desc: Schedule a C-style function for synchronous execution on the current queue.

items.name: - Cancel
items.desc: Stops the queue from dequeueing any further tasks, and notifies the specified handler when all in-flight tasks finish.

items.name: - GetName
items.desc: Returns the name of the queue as a C string.

items.name: - OnQueue
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the current thread matches the dispatch queue's thread.

items.name: + Log
items.desc: Log the current execution context with respect to any queues the current thread holds.
